title: SkillLink

title: Digital Medical Ordonance system
description: Comprehensive task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, team collaboration features, and advanced filtering options.

title: MenyaLo
description: MenyaLo transforms the Rwanda Law Gazette into a searchable, readable, and AI-powered platform that connects citizens, startups, and legal experts through verified insights and community support.

title: Learning Management System
description: Modern LMS with course creation tools, student progress tracking, interactive quizzes, video streaming, and certificate generation.

title: Real Estate Platform
description: Comprehensive real estate platform with property listings, virtual tours, mortgage calculator, agent profiles, and advanced search filters.

title: Fitness Tracking App
description: Personal fitness tracking application with workout plans, progress monitoring, nutrition tracking, and social features for motivation.

title: Financial Dashboard
description: Personal finance management dashboard with expense tracking, budget planning, investment portfolio monitoring, and financial goal setting.

title: U-Connect
description: Community-driven system which connects local government with civilians, providing direct access between leaders and citizens for service requests, feedback, and community updates..
